items.sentence: Tom said that he was so full he had no room for dessert.
Tom often eats at the Chinese restaurant near his house.
I've been there, and it's not all it's cracked up to be.
It isn't always easy to know a good book from a bad one.
Even though we're engaged, she wouldn't let me kiss her.
I didn't use to like wine, but now I'm quite fond of it.
I haven't heard from Tom recently. I hope he's doing OK.
Here's some money. Don't spend it all in the same place.
Tom spent more money on that painting than he should've.
Tom will get back from Australia this week or next week.
